overview: The latest Detroit Sound Project short film produced to commemorate the passing of Detroit DJ, Producer, Educator and Tastemaker – Mike Huckaby. Huckaby died in April 2020 due to complications of a stroke and Covid-19. Fellow Detroit DJ and Producer, Reggie Dokes, poetically commemorates his friend - “Huck” - in this captivating short film.
title: Remembering Huck with Reggie Dokes
